alert.note: Alert for Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 19 at 3:10PM AKST until November 21 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MONDAY TO 3 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Point Hope, Kivalina, and Red Dog Dock. * WHEN...From 9 AM Monday to 3 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas along the coast is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southerly gales will spread north over the the Chukchi Sea on Monday and continue into Monday night, then decrease slowly on Tue. This will cause sea levels to rise several feet above normal and waves will push to the top of the beach, with the worst conditions along south facing shores.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Western Arctic Coast
